gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service

Interface SchematronCategoryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SchematronCategoryServiceImpl

    public interface SchematronCategoryService
    An interface describing how schematron categories are to be managed in the QRDA Validator application.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue, ESAC Inc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY
      SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY is the name of an attribute in a Spring model where the current schematron categories are stored.
      static java.lang.String SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY_FILE
      SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY_FILE is the name of the file that contains a serialized version for the current schematron category objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean activate(SchematronCategory cat, boolean val)
      Activates or Deactivates a schematron category
      SchematronCategory create(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName)
      Creates and saves a new schematron category with the given name and dislayName.
      java.util.List<SchematronCategory> initialBuild()
      Creates and saves (serializes) a new list of schematron category objects from hardcoded default values.
      java.util.List<SchematronCategory> load()
      Loads the serialized schematron category objects from disc,
      java.util.List<SchematronCategory> loadLocal(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Returns the list of schematron category objects as stored in the given session object.
      java.util.List<SchematronCategory> loadOrBuild()
      Returns the current list of schematron categories as stored on disc.
      boolean save(java.util.List<SchematronCategory> specs)
      Serializes the current list of schematron category objects to a file.

      • SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY

        static final java.lang.String SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY
        SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY is the name of an attribute in a Spring model where the current schematron categories are stored.
        See Also:

        static final java.lang.String SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY_FILE
        SCHEMATRON_CATEGORY_FILE is the name of the file that contains a serialized version for the current schematron category objects.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • loadOrBuild

        java.util.List<SchematronCategory> loadOrBuild()
        Returns the current list of schematron categories as stored on disc. If none stored, a default list is built, serialized and returned.
        Returns:
        List of schematron categories

      • create

        SchematronCategory create(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String displayName)
        Creates and saves a new schematron category with the given name and dislayName. The new schematron is marked 'active'.
        Parameters:
        name, - the internal name for the category
        displayName, - the name of the new category as displayed in the UI
        Returns:
        A newly created schematron category object

      • activate

        boolean activate(SchematronCategory cat,
                 boolean val)
        Activates or Deactivates a schematron category
        Parameters:
        cat - the category to activate
        val - the value to use: true = activate, false = deactivate
        Returns:
        active status

      • load

        java.util.List<SchematronCategory> load()
        Loads the serialized schematron category objects from disc,
        Returns:
        List of schematron categories

      • loadLocal

        java.util.List<SchematronCategory> loadLocal(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Returns the list of schematron category objects as stored in the given session object.
        Parameters:
        session - the current HttpSession
        Returns:
        List of schematron categories

      • initialBuild

        java.util.List<SchematronCategory> initialBuild()
        Creates and saves (serializes) a new list of schematron category objects from hardcoded default values.
        Returns:
        List of schematron categories

      • save

        boolean save(java.util.List<SchematronCategory> specs)
        Serializes the current list of schematron category objects to a file.
        Parameters:
        specs, - a list of SchematronCategory objects
        Returns:
        true if serialization was successful
